pages.text: $(thing)Health:$() 20     $(br) $(thing)Attack Damage:$() 3     $(br) $(thing)Behavior:$() Aggressive     $(br) $(thing)Spawn:$() $(l)Nether() $(br) $(thing)Description:$() $(br)Wanders around the nether to scare the humans. It will attack with his long tongue to slow his enemy. It can only be hurt by a special enchantment called $(item)Demon Slayer$().
